'''Version Trailers''' are videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' social media accounts that showcase upcoming content for the respective [[Version]], which include new characters, locations, quests, events, and gameplay features. They are available as a [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLLX5_mCRAauT5NTR0WAZY9V playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.
